thread.title: Very stylish but unperfect services
thread.title_full: Very stylish but unperfect services - Review of Ibis Styles London Southwark Rose, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lachenal_leo
title: Very stylish but unperfect services
text:
The common parts and room decoration are very stylish. The redesign of the hotel decoration occured few years ago to offer a brand new experience from check in to check out.
But, even if the framework is really nice, basic services such as room cleaning aren't so good. For example they didn't changes dirty cups and renew teabags, wich is obviously the real basic.
However, location within London is perfect (on Jubilee & Northern), near Borough Market, Tate Modern, St Paul, etc... is just perfect and worth these small inconveniences.
